content.name: Argon Cyclops - Deluxe Edition
content.description: This mod adds a new L Frigate to the Argon shipyards. An updated and improved version of my old Argon Cyclops and is intended as a replacement to the old mod. The ship comes with new improved visuals over the old version, improved balance and a new bespoke weapon unique to the Cyclops.
content.author: Axeface

text.name: Argon Cyclops - Deluxe Edition
text.description: Добавляет Аргонский корабль Циклоп. Ищите на верфях Аргона.
text.author: Axeface
